Question: This person learned quickly, becoming a strong player at an early age: he was soon playing professionally in various bands.
Hints: By August 1935, this person found himself with a band that was nearly broke, disillusioned and ready to quit.
This person broke with tradition by hiring Teddy Wilson to play with him and drummer Gene Krupa in the ____ Trio.
The two met when they taped a PBS salute to John Hammond and re-created some of the famous this person-Charlie Christian duets.
